step_feedback.feedback: Good start! Keep your arms straight and fingers open as you begin.
Nice job stretching your arms overhead. Remember to keep your fingers spread wide.
Great fist and squeeze! Ensure your shoulder blades are coming together as you push down.
Excellent exhale and relax. Focus on a smooth return to the overhead position.
You completed the first repetition well. Let's get ready for the next one.
Second rep starting strong! Maintain that comfortable posture and open fingers.
Good overhead stretch. Keep those fingers wide and active.
Well done with the fist and squeeze, bringing those shoulder blades together.
Smooth movement on the exhale and relax. You're doing great!
Fantastic job completing both repetitions! You've successfully worked on arm strength and lymph drainage.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the Push Down Pumping exercise! Remember to keep your fingers open and spread wide when stretching your arms overhead. Squeeze your shoulder blades together as you push down to maximize the benefits.
